hi: can I ask a question about ssh ?
nautilus can add sftp servers as a network server from the places menu
putty (the windows ssh program) has pscp and psftp variants
if you have full network access, Places->
will give you full drag-n-drop both ways

ah-ha...can you type the commands on the middle machine? is there an ssh server on the local machine too?
if you can have a shell on B and sshd on A you can do (on B) "scp user@c:file user@a:file"
if that doesn't work, try an IP-over-Carrier Pigeon connection :-S
